issue.title: [CF 622] Any way to show the hp gained by"Frenzied Regeneration"
issue.body:
I have tryed "combat event",but only got an icon,


> Posted by CurseForge user yjcjh | Imported from CurseForge issue #622 | Raw

comments.body:
You need to be a lot more specific in what you want to track here.

  • Do you want to track the amount of healing FR will give you at your current amount of rage?
  • Do you want to track the expected amount of healing from FR if you had 60 rage?
  • Do you want to track the expected amount of healing you will miss out on from FR if you don't have 60 rage?
  • Do you want to track the exact health amount of the above?
  • Do you want to track the above as a percentage of your current health?
  • Do you want to track the above as a percentage of your total health?
Edited Sep 16, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
